title: Walk-In Closet Included in This Pet-Friendly Studio Apartment
posting_body: Check out this studio floor plan available at Grammercy Apartments, a pet-friendly, controlled-access community surrounded by shopping, dining, and recreation.
The home features open-style dining and living areas, creating lots of versatile space.
A breakfast bar connects the dining room to a fully equipped galley kitchen.
Near the bathroom, you have linen and walk-in closets.
You’ll love the elegant look of wood-style flooring throughout the home.
To ensure your comfort, this model has individually controlled heating and air conditioning.
When the weather is pleasant, take your pets out for a stroll along the community’s grass-lined walkways.
You can also enjoy swimming in the pool.
Spend time in the clubhouse and get to know your neighbors.
Make the most of your free time by exercising in the gym or chatting with friends online in the business center or via high-speed Internet.
Please call us regarding our Parking Policy.
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300.00 pet fee per pet and a monthly pet rent of $30.00 per pet.
Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.
Birge and Held Asset Management, LLC
